00099 /* Standalone call to get the transformation center corresponding to the current situation
00100  * returns 1 if successful, 0 otherwise (usually means there's no selection)
00101  * (if 0 is returns, *vec is unmodified)
00102  * */
00103 int calculateTransformCenter(struct bContext *C, int centerMode, float *vec);

00134 /* to be able to add operator properties to other operators */
00135 
00136 #define P_MIRROR        (1 << 0)
00137 #define P_PROPORTIONAL  (1 << 1)
00138 #define P_AXIS          (1 << 2)
00139 #define P_SNAP          (1 << 3)
00140 #define P_GEO_SNAP      (P_SNAP|(1 << 4))
00141 #define P_ALIGN_SNAP    (P_GEO_SNAP|(1 << 5))
00142 #define P_CONSTRAINT    (1 << 6)
00143 #define P_OPTIONS       (1 << 7)
00144 #define P_CORRECT_UV    (1 << 8)
